# Poniki, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Poniki  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Sępopol, within Bartoszyce County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland, close to the border with the Kaliningrad Oblast of Russia. It lies approximately  north-west of Sępopol,  north-east of Bartoszyce, and  north-east of the regional capital Olsztyn.
